extraData: TARGET feywild:summer_pixie ACTION use TIMES 1 USING minecraft:bee_nest
name: Worthy steeds
text: So you have some skill with a sword...that's nice and all, but do you have wits!/nTo prove you worthy of being my servant and protector, you should.../ng&get me....a g&bee's g&nest! Preferably with the bees still inside! Yes!/nWe require more steeds for our cavalry.../nThe Queen will be pleased with my offering!/nBe it the bees or this mortal's corpse....-evil giggle- uh cough cough!/nOw you still here! Now hop along and don't get stung!
